TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Gluban, title = Gluban, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gluban} }

S.FORM: gluban Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko gluban a niyaro', 146 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 501 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 469 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 32 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq82%, Tayal8%, Bunun1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

globan Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko globan a niyaro', 146 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 501 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 469 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 32 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq82%, Tayal8%, Bonon1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
